articles.description: CHRISTOPHER STEVENS: The Witchfinder is simply dire. It's confused, it's tasteless, it's slow, it's laboured, it's unoriginal, it's clunky and it's repetitive. Above all, it's desperately unfunny.
articles.content:

articles.title: Florence Pugh is in talks to reunite with Timothée Chalamet in Dune 2 - The A.V. Club
articles.description: The Little Women actor is reportedly being considered for the role of Princess Irulan
articles.content: Looks like Dune 2 could turn into a Little Women reunion. Florence Pugh is currently in talks to join Denis Villeneuves Dune sequel, so theres a chance she could be sharing screen time with Timothée … [+1724 chars]

articles.title: 'I spent £600 appearing on Come Dine With Me and bosses fixed the winner' - The Mirror
articles.description: Katy Spence appeared on Channel 4 hit show Come Dine With Me back in 2014 and now she's lifting all the secrets, from fixed scores to hidden costs
articles.content:
Whether you watch it for the unusual recipes, the entertaining characters, or when you've been too hungover to reach for the remote, the chances are you'll have seen Come Dine With Me.
